I replayed all Half-Life games, including this after many, many years because of the upcoming Half-Life: Alyx. Half-Life 2 is still a great game with very different gameplay mechanics compared to any other game I've played. This game was 10 years ahead of the competition. It's a masterpeace and a must play.

Awesome story, addicting gameplay, great sound design and voice acting. Still looks pretty decent as well and you can run it on just about anything. One of the best FPS's I've ever played.
one of the greatest games ever made. Highly recommend Half-Life 2 and I give it a easy 9 out of 10.

First time ever playing the Half-Life games. The first Half-Life was pretty good given its age. Second one, so far, is awesome. The game's physics and shooting mechanics are top-notch, and the story has kept me very invested.
The greatest first person shooter ever made, with amazing story, characters, and world building.
....Do I really have to say anything? I mean, c'mon, it's Half-Life 2, of course it's gonna be amazing.
With the help of bhopping you can finish it in 5 minutes
a revolutionary game that no other studio could make also can someone give me an index i don't wanna spend $1000 for one game even if it is alyx

i played a lot of games... really a lot... i love playing computer but i´m reaching my 30´s... ppl wait for HL3... me too... honestly... give us "old people" something to play.. singleplayer + nostalgia = you would let us live our childhood again, for a bit at least... 

sincerly, Harry...

Great game. Best in the series. Awesome combat, compelling music and great characters. Moves at breakneck speeds and has very satisfying fps combat.

Best game ever made. Best FPS still to this day.
um ótimo jogo tanto pela sua historia quanto por suas mecânicas simples e intuitivas

Half-Life 2, is a beautiful game even years after it's release. If you enjoy first-person shooters, this is a must play game.
its good im not done yet but it has good story and mechanics nd stuff

Я пройшов цю ігру і залишився в повному захваті від неї. Це приклад ідеально шутера: Фізика, двигун, графіка, все вище перечислене, це революція в ці роки, Щоб скласти своє враження, її потрібно пройти для початку, я лише можу порадити вам зробити це. Йдіть та скачайте гру, і ви зрозумієте те, що ця гра, дещо більше, ніж просто стрілялка.

Игра просто бомба за деньги 12/12 но играя в эту игру я абалдевал да графон на уровне 8/12 но игра то 2004 и на те года графика была ТОП с + сюжет, множество епизодов, графика, стоимость (может позволить даже бомж ШТУКА) с - некторые баги с озвучкой и в игре  А ТАК ТОПЧИК (игра моих годов)

Вообще я фанат серий игр Half-life мне игра очень нравится. Сюжет очень хороший проработанный и герои запаменающийся. Всем советую в неё поиграть и пройти её от начала и до конца. Покупайте её не пожалейте 
ведь она стоит своих денег.
The phsyics very good I feel like I'm really in the shoes of gordon freeman phd
Incredibile come a distanza di anni risulti appassionante e innovativo. c'è tutto: sparatutto, esplorazione, survival, possibilita' di pilotare i mezzi... un capolavoro senza tempo.
Ну тут нету слов,игра передовая для своего времени так как является первым шутером который задрачивался с физикой)
continua la historia de half life el best juego con historia ever ya con eso te digo todo jugate el 1 y despues este es moooooooyyyy bueno +10

İ5-2520m / intel HD3000 / 4 GB ram ile 720p medium ayarlarda ortalama 75fps veriyor. Bu sistemde böyle ise hemen hemen her sistemde oynanabilir. Çıktığı yıla göre grafik kalitesi cidden çok güzel ve hikayesi için oynamaya değer olduğunu düşünüyorum.
Świetna spójna fabuła ok grafika świetny system fizyczny długa i ciekawa kampania 10/10
Unironically speaking, this is the best game i've ever played
Крутая игра, мне нравится! Всем рекомендую!
